full_sentence: I think a lot of people forget that. Yes it’s called blood but it’s more than that. Only those who are biologically women can have periods because they have uterine walls that need shedding.

Because they get to live their lives on easy mode! Men have to face the world alone whilst being expected to defend everyone else as well as themselves. No one will come to help you if you’re being attacked. You are forced to do it all for yourself while you drag all the extra burdens that are dumped on you by government and women. You pay for all sorts of services that are only for women. You face tougher judgements for everything. They never had to live life as an adult with consequences like us.
